data.title: 2Blades Our Team
data.meta_description: 2Blades has a seasoned team of managers with deep expertise in plant science and business, functioning together with the 2Blades Group and world class SAB
data.text:
Management and Directors

Our leadership team draws on extensive experience in bridging scientific research and business development to implement 2Blades’ programs.

Sustainability Council

Our Council membership comprises leaders from across society who help 2Blades to build a secure financial base, to sustain both our programs and a safe, resilient food system for all.

Scientific Advisory Board

These world-class scientists and global leaders in plant disease research are a key part of 2Blades‘ network, helping us to stay abreast of the most current and significant discoveries.
